mapper.sql: id, medical_record_no, patient_id, apply_date, state, to_hospital_date, wait_level, leucocyte_concentration, neutrophil_concentration, remark, is_visible, is_again
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into apply (id, medical_record_no, patient_id, apply_date, state, to_hospital_date, wait_level, leucocyte_concentration, neutrophil_concentration, remark, is_visible, is_again ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicalRecordNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toHospitalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{waitLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leucocyteConcentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{neutrophilConcentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVisible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAgain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update apply
medical_record_no = #{medicalRecordNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_hospital_date = #{toHospitalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wait_level = #{waitLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leucocyte_concentration = #{leucocyteConcentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
neutrophil_concentration = #{neutrophilConcentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_visible = #{isVisible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_again = #{isAgain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update apply set medical_record_no = #{medicalRecordNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_hospital_date = #{toHospitalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wait_level = #{waitLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leucocyte_concentration = #{leucocyteConcentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, neutrophil_concentration = #{neutrophilConcentration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_visible = #{isVisible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_again = #{isAgain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,medical_record_no, t1.patient_id, apply_date, t1.state, to_hospital_date, wait_level, leucocyte_concentration, neutrophil_concentration, remark,severity,t3.break_times FROM apply t1 LEFT JOIN medical_record t2 ON t1.medical_record_no=t2.id LEFT JOIN user t3 ON t1.patient_id=t3.id WHERE t1.state='2' ORDER BY datediff(CURDATE(), apply_date)*#{waitTimeWeight}+severity*#{severityWeight}-t3.break_times*#{breakAppointmentWeight} DESC limit #{limit}

SELECT count(*) AS num_of_severity, month(t1.to_hospital_date) as to_month, AVG(datediff(t1.to_hospital_date, t1.apply_date)) AS wait_days, t2.severity FROM apply t1 LEFT JOIN medical_record t2 ON t1.medical_record_no=t2.id WHERE year(to_hospital_date)=#{year} AND t1.state='4' GROUP BY to_month, t2.severity ORDER BY to_month
SELECT COUNT(*) AS month_total FROM apply WHERE year(to_hospital_date)=#{year} AND state='4' GROUP BY month(to_hospital_date) ORDER BY month(to_hospital_date)

SELECT count(*) AS num_of_severity, severity FROM apply t1 LEFT JOIN medical_record t2 ON t1.medical_record_no=t2.id WHERE year(to_hospital_date)=#{year} AND t1.state='4' AND month(to_hospital_date)=#{month} GROUP BY severity ORDER BY severity
